title: woderful stay
text: Its wonderful stay. I reach there early but they check in me and the front desk guy is with kind nature and helpful with soft spoken behavior to all the guest who want directions or any kind of help. I can say because I'm woman and traveling alone in the city and if somebody helps you have to appreciate that. room was very good and clean they change the sheet and towels everyday and I like most the SMOKING POLICY of this hotel If you smoked in the room you got charge. Nice Very Nice. location is perfect.
